name: Donald J. Trump
bio: 45th President of the United States, businessman, and media personality
life_history: 0: Grew up in a wealthy family in Queens, New York. 1: Graduated from the University of Pennsylvania with a degree in economics. 2: Took over his father's real estate business and expanded it into a global empire. 3: Hosted reality TV show 'The Apprentice' and became a household name. 4: Elected as the 45th President of the United States in 2016
